channel.title: Papers on Gabe Sekeres
channel.description: Recent content in Papers on Gabe Sekeres

item.title: The Politics of the Slippery Slope
item.description: We present a model of policy provision under endogenous policy momentum and a divided, misinformed polity. Forthcoming in the *Journal of Politics*.

item.title: Association between Anesthesia Group Size and Merit-Based Incentive Payment System Scores
item.description: This paper explores the effect of group size on Medicare scoring criteria. Published in *Anesthesiology*, 2024.

item.title: Association of Patient Race and Hospital with Utilization of Regional Anesthesia for Treatment of Postoperative Pain in Total Knee Arthroplasty: A Retrospective Analysis Using Medicare Claims
item.description: This paper studies the association between patient race and use of regional nerve blocks. Published in *Anesthesiology*, 2024.
